sys_script_fix.description: This script is run after the installation to ensure that the demo data record has the attachment and the related list to the child configuration.
sys_script_fix.name: UpdateDemoData

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_fix_439902f81b8eb110d5be777d8b4bcbb1
sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This script is run after the installation to ensure that the demo data record has the attachment and the related list to the child configuration.</description> <name>UpdateDemoData</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var grConfig = new GlideRecord('x_snc_json_cfg_mgr_json_configuration'); if (grConfig.get('name', 'demo_parent_1')) { grConfig.setForceUpdate(true); grConfig.update(); } // if demo parent]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>tom.hauri</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-10-20 12:19:36</sys_created_on> <sys_id>439902f81b8eb110d5be777d8b4bcbb1</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>UpdateDemoData</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="JSON Cfg Manager" source="x_snc_json_cfg_mgr">078e5ee297052110b434f5f3a253afb6</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="JSON Cfg Manager">078e5ee297052110b434f5f3a253afb6</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_439902f81b8eb110d5be777d8b4bcbb1</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>tom.hauri</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-10-20 12:24:05</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
